Uses of Class
tripleplay.ui.Field

  • Packages that use Field 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of Field in tripleplay.ui

      Methods in tripleplay.ui that return Field 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Field Field.setPopupLabel(String label)
      Configures the label to be displayed when text is requested via a popup.
      Field Field.setTextType(Keyboard.TextType type)
      Deprecated. 
      Use the TEXT_TYPE Style instead.
      Field Field.setTransformer(NativeTextField.Transformer transformer)
      Set the text field transformer for use with this field.
      Field Field.setValidator(NativeTextField.Validator validator)
      Set the text field validator for use with this field.
      Field Field.updateNativeFieldBounds()
      Forcibly notify the NativeTextField backing this field that its screen position has changed.
